Becky woke up at 6:00 am as usual. Her small PJs showing her plump belly. She worked at McDonalds. They recently started allowing employees to eat free. So how could she resist? She started to work. A 10 year old girl was in the line. She was very fat. She had been coming here everyday for every meal! She ordered.

"I'll have 7 big mac's, 5 choco milkshakes, 3 large fries, and 4 ice cream cones." The girls said.

Becky couldn't believe her ears.

"Where are your parents?" Becky asked

"Home. They gave me enough money to buy this."

"You know, that much food isn't healthy." Becky whispered.

"Maybe not, but it's soooo good."

The girl waddled off to her table and sat down. The bench sank under her weight.

20 minutes later her food was ready. When she got it Becky sat down at another table and ate her lunch. She looked over at the little girl. She was stuffing the food down her throat! No wonder she was so fat!

The little girl finished, her belly poking out of her shirt and left. Becky went back to work.

13.content:
9 year-old Trish was always a healthy girl. She was on the soccer team and she was there best player. One day Trish and her friends Beth and Jen were sitting at home watching TV. A commercial came on.

"Buy McDonalds Kids Meals! Now at a cheaper price! And Kids Meals have been proven to increase health!" The TV said.

"Wow! Now we can eat Kids Meals and not Gain any weight!" Beth said

"I'm not sure. Looked kind of suspicious." Jen said wearily

"C'mon. How often do we get to eat McDonalds?" Trish said to her friends

"Never."

"And why is that?"

"Because Coach says that we'll gain weight, become obese, and won't be able to play anymore."

"Right! Now it's healthy! Lets go!"

The girls went down the stairs to the door and headed out. Trish's family was wealthy so she had money. They arrived at McDonalds.

"What would you like to order?" An obese woman behind the counter said.

"We'll have 3 kids meals please." Jen said

10 minutes later the girls sat down

"Wow! the Kids meals sure are big!" Trish stated

What they didn't know was that the alien corporation changed Kids Meals to Super-Sized Meals.

"Oh well." Beth took a bite "This is really good!"

She took another bite and another and another! about 5 minutes later the girls finished their meals.

"You know, I'm still hungry!" Jen said

So were the other 2. REALLY HUNGRY! This time they ordered 12 Kids meals.

They found themselves unable to stop eating.

14.content:
"...look, Champ, I'm tellin' ya, it's what your fans want. We can't get gigs anymore unless yer sportin' a beer belly." Jones, an agent, explained to his client, the renowned movie actor, Vince Le Grande-Mangeur. He was an athletically built, six foot three, blond hair, blue-eyed icon of all we admire; but, in the story world, that image of the strapping, fit man was fading fast, as they were becoming so rare. Even Vince's agent, Jones, was no lightweight; a heavy butterball belly was well defined beneath his sport coat. The average weight for men had crept up to 250 pounds, women, 210. Needless to say, with his out-of-fashion rock hard body of 190 pounds, Vince had some catching up to do.

"Hm...s'pose yer right, Jones." Vince muttered. He was actually quite relieved; the workout regimen was getting boring, anyways. And why work that much if it's not what your fans want, anyways?

Jones grinned, "A'ight! Now maybe you'll join the rest of the cast for Brunch, lunch, dinner, supper, AND late-night snacks at the Commisary, eh?" Jones chuckled at his own joke; it was lost on Vince. Vince, by society's standards, was of normal intellect; an IQ of 95. Jones, thankfully, was one of the smart ones, with an IQ of 120.

"Now, Champ, what should we start with? No more workout; as they say, flab is fab. You feelin' like Mexican, Chinese, or that crazy McDonald's the whole town keeps yappin' about?"

Vince stroked his chin, "The McD place." He answered. Jones gave the star his allowance (Jones had been put in charge of Vince's finances) and the star was off!

=You now begin as Vince=

You enter the McDonald's on the rare occasion that it's not busy: that short period between the brunch and lunch rushes. You, and the huge, 500 pound cashier are the only ones seen; besides the plus sized kitchen staff behind the counter. As you approach, the cashier monotonously greets you,

"Hello, sir or madam." He drones... Vince suspected he wasn't the smartest one of the bunch. "Welcome to McDonald's, can we interest you in our gut-buster special? 'smile at customer'" the cashier gives a pitiful attempt at a grin; he obviously hates his job.

You are ready to order...
14.title: Flab is Fab in Hollywood

15.content:
At the age of 8, Erin Dawnson was a very thin girl. She did pretty much every sport you could think of, got great grades, and a fit figure. She always ate the healthiest foods, no junk food. When Erin was 9, her parents died in a terrible car crash. When that horrible incident happened, Erin was sheltered by her Grandparents. Her Grandparents weren't the greatest eaters. The always kept their cabinets filled with yummy, fattening treats. They almost never left their house, either. Except for 2 reasons. One, to stock up on more food. Two, to go to Mcdonalds. The Dawson Grandparents went to Mcdonalds almost every weekend. When they introduced Erin to Mcdonalds, she was reluctant.

"Open up, here comes the Mctrain!" Grandma teased

"Oh! Here comes the Mcplane! Nrrrroooowww!" Grandpa played along

"No! I won't eat it!" Erin refused

"Why not dear?" Grandma asked

"I see kids all the time. My friends used to be thin. Now they come to Mcdonalds, and they get fat." Erin explained

"At least try it." Grandpa suggested

Erin looked at the burger. It did look pretty good...
15.title: Something else

151.content:
"Well... one bite." Erin said

She reached for the burger and took a bite. Her mouth was surrounded by tasty greasy goodness. She took another bite, and then another. Ever since that day, Erin ate at Mcdonalds every weekend. The more she ate of course, the fatter she got. When she was 10 she went to soccer practice one day.

"Erin Dawnson?" The coach said

"Here, sir." Erin called

"Come here." He called her over

Erin was now at least 180 pounds. A double chin was forming, and her belly poked out from under her shirt.

"Erin... have you been eating all right?" He asked, not to insult her

"Yes... I guess." Erin hesitated

"Well... all right."

Erin went back onto the field. They started to practice, but after a few minutes, Erin got tired. The coach took her off the team until she lost some weight.

So now...
151.title: She tries it
